page.title: 10Economic L ife in Preston
page.content:
Economic life in Preston
Preston lies in the middle of the country's largest pig farming concentration. Naturally therefore the area itself tends to reflect this fact. There is a large slaughterhouse which deals almost exclusively with pig meat. The slaughterhouse owned by the Rawson family, is a large employer of labour. Within our area there are 2 small engineering workshops, one owned by the Jones Brothers which produces pipe work and metal fabrications and another which produces smaller scale farm related items. Several large farms and one very large garden centre provide employment for local labour.
